Home Screen NEXT SKIP GOT IT
// yahan py title or description change kr do saari welcome screen ka
Lawyer\'s Category Here, You can select lawyer according to your requirement, which is quite easy and time saving for you.
Consultation Here, The Lawyer and Client can consult with each other. They can discuss their cases.
Hiring Here, You can hire a lawyer according to your requirement.The Lawyers are categorised into catagories.
Ratings Here,The Client can provide ratings to Lawyer, also Lawyer can provide rating to the client.
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data Play Again MainActivity
Open navigation drawer Close navigation drawer
